perturbation.explanation: The modification prohibits mPhase from assigning the contract under any circumstance, even with Lucent's consent. While contracts can restrict assignment, an absolute prohibition, especially if it unreasonably restricts mPhase's ability to conduct its business, could be challenged as an unreasonable restraint on trade. This might violate state antitrust laws or common law principles against unreasonable restrictions on alienability of contract rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State Antitrust Laws; Common Law Principles Against Unreasonable Restraints on Alienability of Contract Rights
